dcterms:creator: A. Das
K. Kottur
K. Gupta
A. Singh
D. Yadav
J. M. Moura
D. Parikh
D. Batra
dcterms:description: The VisDial v1.0 dataset consists of dialogs about images, where each dialog is composed of question-answer pairs along with a caption. It is designed to evaluate visual dialog systems by providing a context of previous interactions.
dcterms:title: VisDial v1.0

dcterms:creator: C. Hori
H. Alamri
J. Wang
G. Wichern
T. Hori
A. Cherian
T. K. Marks
V. Cartillier
R. G. Lopes
A. Das
dcterms:description: The Audio Visual Scene-aware Dialog dataset is designed for end-to-end dialog systems that utilize both audio and visual features to generate responses based on multimodal inputs.
dcterms:title: Audio Visual Scene-aware Dialog

dcterms:creator: S. Kottur
J. M. Moura
D. Parikh
D. Batra
dcterms:description: CLEVR-Dialog is a diagnostic dataset for multi-round reasoning in visual dialog, designed to evaluate the reasoning capabilities of dialog systems in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: CLEVR-Dialog

dcterms:creator: H. De Vries
F. Strub
S. Chandar
O. Pietquin
H. Larochelle
A. Courville
dcterms:description: GuessWhat?! is a dataset for visual object discovery through multi-modal dialogue, where agents interact to identify objects in images through a series of yes/no questions.
dcterms:title: GuessWhat?!
